recipe.title: Herb-Roasted Eggplant with Tomatoes and Feta
ingredients: 4 large plum tomatoes, cored, quartered lengthwise
2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons chopped fresh oregano
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Place eggplant and tomatoes on rimmed baking sheet; toss with oil and vinegar. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons oregano, salt, and pepper. Roast until eggplant is tender and golden brown, stirring occasionally, about 40 minutes. Transfer eggplant and tomatoes to platter. Sprinkle with feta and 2 teaspoons oregano and serve.
